sentences.english: Introduce the application of the acupoints in clinical diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 介紹腧穴在診斷上的運用。

sentences.english: The basis of acupuncture is the theory of meridians and acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 鍼灸的理論基礎就是經絡腧穴理論。

sentences.english: Be familiar with the application of the acupoints in clinical diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉腧穴在診斷上的運用。

sentences.english: To understand the development situation and the nomenclature of acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解腧穴的發展情況及腧穴的命名。

sentences.english: To understand the development situation and the nomenclature of acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解腧穴的發展情況及腧穴的命名。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the structure of micro vessel in Houhai point and its relationship with meridians and collaterals.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索穴區內微血管構築及與經絡腧穴的關係。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of acupoints moxibustion to treat postoperative patients with urine retention after accepting craniocerebral operation.
sentences.chinese: 觀察腧穴熱敏化艾灸治療顱腦術後病人尿瀦留的效果。

sentences.english: The research provides a reliable basis for the theory of acupoint specificity.
sentences.chinese: 本研究爲腧穴特異性理論提供了可靠的依據。

sentences.english: Acupoints compatibility is the key to acupuncture prescription, directly related to the therapeutic effect.
sentences.chinese: 腧穴的配伍是鍼灸處方的關鍵，直接關係到治療效果。

sentences.english: The current recognition of the concept of acupoint is lopsided.
sentences.chinese: 現今對腧穴概念的理解是不全面的。

definition: acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
one of the channels of TCM
Quchi acupoint LI11, at the lateral end of the elbow crease

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
